Pre-Game Insights: Toss: England win and bowl first
Post-Match Reflections: Very satisfying,” says Rohit Sharma. “We worked very hard as a unit, adapted well … the conditions were challenging.

Buttler is asked how he views England’s whole tournament. “Really proud of everyone,” he says. “We’ve had lots of adversity, stuck together really well as a group. Played some really good cricket … in patches.”
Others: England need 119 off 11 overs and these two will have to get nearly all of them.
